topic.title: HPE Helion Development Platform 2.0: ALS Command Reference: Placement Zones

ul.li: helion placement-zone: Show the list of DEAs associated with the specified placement zone.
helion placement-zones: Show the available placement zones.
helion set-placement-zone: Associate the application with a specific placement zone.
helion unset-placement-zone: Remove the association between an application and its current placement zone.

section.title: Syntax
section.p: For more information, use the helion help or helion help [command] commands.

section.title: helion set-placement-zone <application> <zone>
section.p: Associate the application with a specific placement zone.

row.entry: Path of the manifest file to use. If not specified, a search is performed.

The time the client waits for an application to start before giving up and returning, in seconds. Note that this is measured from the last entry seen in the log stream. While there is activity in the log the timeout is reset. The default is 2 minutes. Use the suffixes 'm', 'h', and 'd' for the convenient specification of minutes, hours, and days. The optional suffix 's' stands for seconds.
The once-off authentication token to use for the current operation only.
